all_news.title: Ramalan Harga DeXe: Apakah yang Mendorong Pertumbuhan Mata Wang DeXe Protocol?
all_news.description: Sepanjang minggu lalu, mata wang kripto Protokol DeXe — token DEXE — menunjukkan pertumbuhan meskipun pasaran keseluruhan mengalami kemerosotan. Harganya meningkat daripada...
all_news.content:
Sepanjang minggu lepas, mata wang kripto Protokol DeXe — token DEXE — telah menunjukkan pertumbuhan walaupun pasaran keseluruhan mengalami penurunan. Harganya meningkat daripada sekitar $14 pada 29 Januari kepada kira-kira $24 menjelang 3 Februari. Sehingga penulisan ini, 5 Februari, token DeXe (DEXE) telah kembali meningkat dan diniagakan sekitar $21.2.

Walaupun dengan peningkatan harga baru-baru ini, token ini nampaknya menuju ke masa depan yang penuh dengan peluang dan pertumbuhan. Dalam sebulan yang lalu, harganya melonjak sebanyak 24%, dan sepanjang tahun lalu, ia telah meningkat secara mendadak sebanyak 653%.

Apakah rahsia di sebalik pertumbuhan token ini, dan yang paling penting, bagaimana ramalan harga coin DeXe kelihatan?

**Isi Kandungan**

Apakah DeXe
Ramalan harga DeXe: pandangan keseluruhan
Ramalan harga DeXe 2025
Ramalan harga DeXe 2030
Anda mungkin juga menyukai: Inilah sebabnya mengapa harga DeXe meningkat dan apa yang diharapkan

**Apakah DeXe**

Protokol DeXe ialah infrastruktur inovatif yang direka untuk mencipta dan menguruskan DAO. Ia menawarkan set alat yang berkuasa untuk membina produk Web3 peringkat tinggi merentas pelbagai rangkaian blok — fikir kilang kontrak pintar untuk DAO, pengurusan pengundian, penyelesaian perbendaharaan, pelancaran, dan ciri perwakilan. Cukup menarik, bukan?

DeXe (DEXE) ialah token asli Protokol DeXe. Ia digunakan dalam beberapa cara penting dalam platform ini, seperti:

Tadbir urus. Pemegang token DEXE berhak untuk menyertai tadbir urus DAO DeXe dengan mengundi cadangan dan perubahan kepada protokol.
Ganjaran. Peserta aktif yang terlibat dalam proses tadbir urus diganjari dengan token DEXE.
Pembayaran dalam protokol. Sesetengah operasi pada platform memerlukan pembayaran dibuat dalam token DEXE.
Pengagihan dana perbendaharaan. Perbendaharaan DeXe memperuntukkan dana DEXE untuk menyokong inisiatif dan program yang menjanjikan yang bertujuan untuk pembangunan ekosistem.

Faktor-faktor manakah yang menyumbang kepada peningkatan token ini? Mari kita lihat lebih dekat pada ramalan harga DeXe.

**Ramalan harga DeXe: pandangan keseluruhan**

Apakah yang menjadikan DEXE menjanjikan? Banyak sebenarnya. Harga telah meningkat disebabkan oleh beberapa faktor: minat yang semakin meningkat terhadap DeFi dan DAO, pelancaran berterusan ciri-ciri protokol baharu, dan perkongsian strategik dengan projek Web3 lain.

Pelancaran baru-baru ini di Ethereum, ditambah dengan penambahan lebih daripada $1 bilion dalam token DEXE kepada tadbir urus DAO DeXe, telah menarik banyak perhatian. Di samping itu, penguncian Perbendaharaan DAO dan pengenalan peneguhan untuk DAO telah membantu menarik komuniti dengan lebih banyak lagi.

Sekiranya DeFi dan DAO terus berkembang, dan DeXe mengukuhkan lebih banyak perkongsian yang kukuh, nilai DEXE boleh terus meningkat, menjadikannya token yang perlu anda perhatikan dalam tahun-tahun akan datang.

Apakah ramalan harga kripto DeXe untuk 2025 dan seterusnya?

**Ramalan harga DeXe 2025**

Menurut ramalan harga DeXe oleh CoinCodex, harga token dijangka meningkat sebanyak 30.8%, berpotensi mencapai harga $28.53 menjelang 5 Mac 2024.

Sehingga 4 Februari 2025, sentimen keseluruhan untuk ramalan harga DeXe kekal menaik, dengan 28 indikator analisis teknikal menunjukkan isyarat menaik dan 2 menunjukkan trend menurun.

Melihat ke hadapan pada tahun 2025, DigitalCoinPrice meramalkan bahawa DEXE akan segera mengatasi paras tertinggi sebelumnya iaitu $33.54. Mereka menjangkakan harganya akan stabil antara $43.49 dan $46.3.

Berdasarkan jangkaan CoinCodex untuk DeXe pada tahun 2025, token ini dijangka diniagakan antara $19.58 dan $52.17 pada tahun ini.

Wallet Investor meramalkan bahawa menjelang akhir tahun 2025, coin ini boleh mencapai harga maksimum sekitar $31.7.

Adakah DeXe akan naik atau turun dalam masa lima tahun?

**Ramalan harga DeXe 2030**

Menurut unjuran Wallet Investor, harga maksimum berpotensi boleh mencecah setinggi $74.5 menjelang Februari 2030. DigitalCoinPrice meramalkan bahawa harga coin DeXe boleh mengatasi $112.12 pada tahun 2030, dengan harga minimum $100.06 dan harga maksimum $115.49. CoinCodex menganggarkan bahawa menjelang tahun 2030, harga DEXE boleh berada antara $35.03 dan $83.26.

Anda mungkin juga menyukai: DEXE menentang trend pasaran menurun, apakah yang mendorong perhimpunan ini?

Adakah DeXe pelaburan yang baik? Tiada siapa yang boleh mengatakan dengan pasti apa yang akan berlaku seterusnya, tetapi DeXe telah berada di landasan menaik, didorong oleh ekosistemnya yang semakin berkembang dan ciri-ciri DAO yang inovatif.

Ramalan nampaknya optimis tentang masa depannya, menunjukkan potensi pertumbuhan yang lebih banyak. Walau bagaimanapun, kripto sentiasa tidak dapat diramalkan, dan kejayaan DeXe mungkin bergantung pada keadaan pasaran, perkembangan teknologi, dan sejauh mana ia diterima oleh komuniti kripto yang lebih luas.

Penafian: Artikel ini tidak mewakili nasihat pelaburan. Kandungan dan bahan yang dipaparkan di halaman ini adalah untuk tujuan pendidikan sahaja.

all_news.title: Metaplanet, Pemegang Tegar Bitcoin, Catat Keuntungan Belum Sah $35 Juta pada 2024 Berkat Rizab BTC
all_news.description: Metaplanet mendakwa ia merupakan ekuiti paling berprestasi tinggi pada tahun 2024 daripada 55,000 syarikat tersenarai awam.
all_news.content:
Metaplanet (3350) announced full-year 2024 financial results and is now sitting on an unrealized gain of approximately $36 million (5.46 billion yen) on a total of 1,761 BTC, acquired for $137 million.
The bitcoin investor said it increased its shareholder base by 500% to 50,000 in 2024.
Metaplanet has several ways of increasing bitcoin holdings per share. The first is debt issuance, which is achieved through secured bonds, convertible bonds, and the use of bitcoin as collateral.
The second is equity issuance through private placement, preference shares, convertible bonds and warrants on top of cash flow from business operations, according to the presentation.
The firm plans to acquire 10,000 BTC by the end of 2025 and 21,000 BTC by 2026-end. This will be achieved by issuing 21 million shares in moving strike warrants.
Metaplanet shares were up 8% on Monday and up 64% year to date.

all_news.title: Jualan NFT Turun 30% Minggu Lepas kepada $119 Juta – InsideBitcoins
all_news.description: The global non-fungible token market is experiencing a short bear season in recent weeks, after retesting a significant resurgence in the 4th quar...
all_news.content:
The global non-fungible token market is experiencing a short bear season in recent weeks, after retesting a significant resurgence in the 4th quarter of 2024. In yet another week, the non-fungible token market has plunged again, recording a trading sales volume of $119 million. In the past seven days, the NFT market sales have plunged by 33% from the previous week.
Join us in showcasing the cryptocurrency revolution, one newsletter at a time. Subscribe now to get daily news and market updates right to your inbox, along with our millions of other subscribers (that’s right, millions love us!) — what are you waiting for?
NFT Sales Fell +30% Last Week
Data compiled by cryptoslam.io, a crypto market data aggregator and a multi-chain non-fungible token collection explorer, shows that the global non-fungible token market has slightly plunged in trading sales volume again this last week. From February 03 to February 09, the global non-fungible token market amassed a trading sales volume of over $119 million, down 33% from the previous week. The NFT market raised a trading sales volume of $141 million in the last week of January.
Ethereum, the blockchain network renowned in the NFT market for hosting the majority of blue-chip non-fungible token collections, was the most traded blockchain network in the NFT market this last week. From February 03 to February 09, 2025, the Ethereum-based NFT collections recorded a trading sales volume of $62 million. During this time, the Ethereum NFT trading sales volume plunged by 36% from the previous week.
Mythos Chain, the blockchain network created to ensure secure and efficient transactions across the entire Mythos NFT gaming ecosystem, was last week’s second most-traded blockchain network in the NFT market. From February 03 to February 09, the Mythos Chain-based NFT collections recorded a trading sales volume of $13 million. During this time, the Mythos Chain NFT trading sales volume surged by 4.46% from the previous week.
Solana, an on-chain decentralized blockchain network renowned for hosting a variety of smart contracts for non-fungible token collections, was this past week’s third most-traded blockchain network in the global NFT market. From February 03 to February 09, the Solana-based NFT collections recorded a trading sales volume of $11 million. During this time, the Solana NFT trading sales volume has fallen by 32% from the previous week.
Polygon, an Ethereum scaling blockchain network, was this past week’s fourth most-traded NFT blockchain in the global non-fungible token market. From February 03 to February 09, 2025, the Polygon-based NFT collections raised a trading sales volume of $8.1 million. During this time, the Polygon NFT trading sales volume surged 10.9% from the past week. Polygon has risen back in the five top NFT blockchains after several weeks of downturn.
Bitcoin, the blockchain network renowned in the NFT market for powering the popular Runes, BRC-20, and Ordinal collections, was this past week’s fifth most-traded blockchain network in the NFT market. From February 03 to February 09, the Bitcoin-based NFT collection raised a trading sales volume of $6.7 million. During this period, the Bitcoin NFT trading sales volume has plunged by 71% from the previous week.
Five Top Selling NFTs In The Past 7 Days
1. Pudgy Penguins NFT Collection
Pudgy Penguins, another globally acknowledged non-fungible token collection from the digital asset firm Igloo Inc featuring a fixed supply of 8,888 cute penguin cartoon birds hosted on the Ethereum blockchain network, was this past week’s most-selling NFT collection in the NFT market. From February 03 to February 09, the Pudgy Penguins NFT collection raised a trading sales volume of $9.1 million. During this period, the Pudgy Penguins NFT trading sales volume has plunged by 37% from the past week.
2.DMarket NFT Collection
DMarket, a non-fungible token collection that represents in-game virtual items of popular online games like Counter-Strike, Rust, and Dota 2, was this past week’s second most-selling NFT collection in the NFT market. From February 03 to February 09, the DMarket NFT collection raised a trading sales volume of $8.7 million. During this time, the DMarket NFT trading sales volume surged by 7.98% from the previous week.
3. Courtyard NFT Collection
Courtyard, a non-fungible token collection from Courtyard.io, a first-of-its-kind marketplace that enables anyone to easily own and trade physical cards on the blockchain, featuring a limited set of 87,777 digital items stored on the Polygon blockchain network, was this past week’s third most-traded NFT collection in the NFT market. From February 03 to February 09, the Courtyard NFT series raised a trading sales volume of $7.3 million. During this time, the Courtyard NFT trading sales volume has soared by 25% from the previous week.
4. CryptoPunks NFT Collection
CryptoPunks, another globally acknowledged non-fungible token collection featuring a limited edition of 10,000 pixilated NFTs previously from the digital asset firm Larva Labs but now managed by Yuga Labs, was this past week’s fourth most-selling NFT collection in the NFT market. From February 03 to February 09, the CryptoPunks NFT collection amassed a trading sales volume of $5.2 million. During this time, the CryptoPunks NFT sales volume plunged by 30% from the previous week.
5. Azuki NFT collection
Azuki, another globally acknowledged non-fungible token collection from the digital asset firm Chiru Labs featuring a limited edition of 10,000 anime-themed NFTs hosted on the Ethereum blockchain network, was this past week’s fifth most-traded NFT collection in the NFT market. From February 03 to February 09, the Azuki NFT collection raised a trading sales volume of $5 million, closing our five top-selling NFTs this past week. The Azuki NFT trading sales volume has plunged by 79% from the previous week.

all_news.title: Adakah XRP Akan Mengatasi Cabaran Pasaran Baru-Baru Ini?
all_news.description: Ripple‘s cryptocurrency, XRP, is currently at the center of attention within the digital currency landscape due to notable price fluctuations. As ...
all_news.content:
Ripple‘s cryptocurrency, XRP, is currently at the center of attention within the digital currency landscape due to notable price fluctuations. As of February 10, 2025, XRP was valued at $2.39, varying between $2.32 and $2.50 during the trading day. The recent surge in the volume of XRP moving onto exchanges paired with a negative market outlook has intensified pressure on its pricing. Experts urge caution for those navigating this unpredictable market atmosphere.
What Do Increased Inflows to Exchanges Indicate?
On February 6, 2025, significant transfers exceeding $15 million worth of XRP were recorded on popular exchanges like Bybit and Kraken. Such movements typically signal that holders are considering selling their assets, pointing to a potential rise in selling pressure on XRP’s market value in the near future.
The heightened volume of XRP entering exchanges generally suggests preparation for sales. Close monitoring of these inflows is essential. If this trend continues without a corresponding rise in demand, XRP could breach crucial support levels, particularly if it dips below $2.30, leading to increased sell-offs.
XRP Price Analysis: Bearish Signals Intensify
Market indicators for XRP—specifically its futures—show negative funding rates, reinforcing bearish sentiments. As of February 6, the measured 8-hour funding rate stood at -0.0065, pointing toward a dominant short position among traders anticipating a drop in value. Unlike more stable cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and Ethereum, XRP’s negative funding indicates a more pessimistic outlook.
Technical analysis reveals XRP’s trading below its 10-day and 21-day exponential moving averages, suggesting an ongoing downtrend. Support levels are established at $2.30 and $2.20, while resistance is noted at $2.50 and $2.70.
What Should Investors Do?
Market dynamics for XRP are heavily influenced by the performance of Bitcoin and the broader crypto sector. Regulatory concerns and an overall cautious approach from traders could further elevate volatility. While there may be room for a rebound, a fall below the $2.30 threshold could precipitate a more severe decline.
Investors must prioritize risk management in this unpredictable environment.
A positive shift in funding rates and a reduction in influx to exchanges could signal potential recovery.
Monitoring market trends closely will be vital for timely decision-making.
Navigating the current landscape will require careful observation and strategic planning from traders engaging with XRP, particularly as market pressures continue to mount.
Continue Reading: Will XRP Overcome Recent Market Challenges?

all_news.title: Pengerusi Bursa Korea: Korea Selatan perlu meluluskan ETF kripto atau ketinggalan zaman
all_news.description: Korea Selatan perlu memperkenalkan dana perdagangan bursa (ETF) mata wang kripto untuk kekal kompetitif dalam kewangan global, menurut pengerusi Korea Ex...
all_news.content:
Pengerusi Bursa Korea: Korea Selatan Mesti Meluluskan ETF Kripto atau Tertinggal

Korea Selatan perlu memperkenalkan dana dagangan bursa (ETF) mata wang kripto untuk kekal kompetitif dalam kewangan global, menurut pengerusi Bursa Korea (KRX).

Dalam temu bual baru-baru ini di Seoul, pengerusi Jung Eun-bo menekankan bahawa dengan Korea Selatan sebagai "negara perdagangan mata wang kripto sebenar ketiga terbesar," melambatkan ETF kripto boleh menyebabkannya ketinggalan di belakang pasaran global yang sudahpun maju.

Beliau menunjuk kepada Amerika Syarikat, di mana kedua-dua ETF Bitcoin niaga hadapan dan spot "sedia ada dan diniagakan secara aktif," sebagai contoh bagaimana pasaran lain menerima perubahan ini. Jung menambah bahawa ETF kripto boleh membawa peluang baharu kepada sektor kewangan negara.

"Mata wang kripto mewakili sektor yang mampu menjana nilai baharu dalam industri kewangan [...] Kita tidak boleh menangguhkan pengenalan perdagangan ETF mata wang kripto," kata Jung.

Setakat Februari 2025, pasaran AS mempunyai sejumlah 20 produk dana dagangan bursa mata wang kripto, merangkumi tawaran berasaskan spot dan niaga hadapan. Ini termasuk 12 ETF Bitcoin spot, 8 ETF strategi Bitcoin, dan 9 ETF Ethereum spot.

Di luar Bitcoin dan Ethereum, landskap ETF kripto semakin berkembang untuk memasukkan aset digital lain. Pengurus aset telah memfailkan permohonan untuk ETF yang menyasarkan mata wang kripto seperti Solana, XRP, dan juga duit meme seperti Dogecoin.

Komen Jung datang pada masa di mana sektor kewangan Korea Selatan bergelut dengan pelbagai cabaran, termasuk asas pelabur yang semakin kecil dan apa yang beliau sebut sebagai "syarikat zombi"—syarikat yang bergelut yang terus hidup dengan pinjaman.

Beliau percaya bahawa menerima ETF mata wang kripto boleh memperkayakan pasaran dengan menawarkan pelabur cara yang lebih selamat dan terkawal untuk mengakses aset digital. Menurut beliau, memperkenalkan ETF kripto sejajar dengan matlamatnya untuk memodenkan landskap kewangan di negara ini.

Jung juga menimbangkan peraturan, memberi amaran bahawa perundangan yang berlebihan boleh mencekik inovasi dalam pasaran. Beliau juga menggesa untuk mengurangkan sekatan ke atas pelaburan dana pencen dalam ekuiti, dengan alasan bahawa had yang terlalu ketat ke atas aset berisiko tinggi boleh menjejaskan pulangan jangka panjang.

Seperti yang dilaporkan sebelum ini oleh crypto.news, Jung menggesa untuk meneroka ETF mata wang kripto selepas pasaran saham Korea Selatan dilanda kekacauan dan menyaksikan ramai pelabur keluar selepas percubaan Presiden Yoon Suk-yeol yang gagal untuk mengisytiharkan darurat tentera. Bercakap di Majlis Pembukaan Pasaran Sekuriti dan Derivatif 2025, Jung berhujah bahawa Korea Selatan perlu meneroka sektor perniagaan baharu.

Pada bulan Oktober, media tempatan melaporkan bahawa pengawal selia Korea Selatan sedang mempertimbangkan untuk meluluskan ETF kripto tetapi tidak memberikan garis masa tertentu. Awal tahun ini, gabenor Perkhidmatan Penyeliaan Kewangan, Lee Bok-hyun, memberi petunjuk tentang perbincangan yang sedang berlangsung sama ada untuk membenarkan ETF Bitcoin spot di Korea Selatan.
